alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:51AM PST until February 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Heavy snow in the Sierra through this evening with low snow levels... .A cold weather system will continue bring moderate to heavy snow to the northern Sierra Nevada today. This will lead to significant travel impacts across the passes. Lowering snow levels on Tuesday may bring a dusting of snow down into the lower foothill elevations. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Plan on slippery road conditions, Additional snow accumulations of two to 4 inches. * WHERE...Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley, Motherlode and Western Plumas County/Lassen Park. * WHEN...Until 10 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
